Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameLobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameLobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote
public class GameLobby extends GameObservable implements Serializable, Remote
Represents a game lobby. This class extends GameObservable and implements Serializable and Remote interfaces.
See Also:
